public ref class EmptyObjectToObjectConverter : Windows::UI::Xaml::DependencyObject, Windows::UI::Xaml::Data::IValueConverter

Docs.summary: This class converts an object value into a an object (if the value is null returns the false value). Can be used to bind a visibility, a color or an image to the value of an object.
